ctaSection.title: Ready to Start Your Construction Project?
ctaSection.description: Contact our team of building specialists to discuss your project needs and vision

categories.title: Renovations
categories.description: Transform your existing space into something extraordinary

content.introduction: Our renovation services are designed to breathe new life into your existing property. Whether you're looking to update a single room or transform your entire home, our team delivers exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail at every stage.

sections.title: Interior Renovations
sections.content: From kitchen and bathroom updates to complete interior overhauls, we handle all aspects of interior renovation with meticulous care and precision.

sections.title: Exterior Renovations
sections.content: Transform the look and functionality of your property with our comprehensive exterior renovation services, including fa√ßade updates, roofing, and outdoor living spaces.

featuredProjects.title: Victorian Terrace Renovation
featuredProjects.description: A complete renovation of a Victorian property in London, preserving period features while introducing modern comforts

featuredProjects.title: Contemporary Apartment Transformation
featuredProjects.description: A comprehensive renovation of a dated apartment into a sleek, modern living space

testimonials.quote: Sovran Group transformed our outdated property into a stunning contemporary home. Their attention to detail and problem-solving abilities made all the difference.
testimonials.author: James Wilson

testimonials.quote: The renovation of our Victorian property was handled with such care and respect for the original features. The team's craftsmanship is simply outstanding.
testimonials.author: Sarah Thompson

processSteps.title: Initial Consultation
processSteps.description: We discuss your renovation goals, budget, and timeline to understand your vision.

processSteps.title: Design & Planning
processSteps.description: Our design team creates detailed plans and visualizations of your renovation project.

processSteps.title: Building Regulations & Permits
processSteps.description: We handle all necessary permits and ensure compliance with building regulations.

processSteps.title: Construction Phase
processSteps.description: Our skilled craftsmen execute the renovation with precision and attention to detail.

processSteps.title: Quality Inspection & Handover
processSteps.description: A thorough quality check ensures everything meets our high standards before project completion.

gallery.caption: Before: Dated interior ready for transformation
After: Elegant, modern living space
Contemporary kitchen renovation with premium finishes

categories.title: New Builds
categories.description: Create your dream home from the ground up

content.introduction: Our new build services offer you the opportunity to create a home that perfectly matches your lifestyle and aesthetic preferences. From contemporary designs to traditional styles, we bring your vision to life with exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail.

sections.title: Bespoke Design
sections.content: Working closely with our architects and designers, we create a custom home design that reflects your personal style and meets your specific requirements.

sections.title: Quality Construction
sections.content: Our team of skilled craftsmen utilizes the finest materials and construction techniques to build a home of exceptional quality and durability.

featuredProjects.title: Contemporary Family Home
featuredProjects.description: A modern new build designed for family living with sustainable features and innovative design

featuredProjects.title: Luxury Georgian-inspired Residence
featuredProjects.description: A new build combining classical architecture with modern amenities and technology

testimonials.quote: Building our dream home with Sovran Group was an incredible experience. Their guidance throughout the process and commitment to quality exceeded our expectations.
testimonials.author: Michael Harris

testimonials.quote: The attention to detail in our new home is remarkable. Sovran Group understood our vision perfectly and delivered a house that truly feels like our forever home.
testimonials.author: Emma Richards

processSteps.title: Design Brief
processSteps.description: We gather detailed information about your requirements, preferences, and budget for your new home.

processSteps.title: Architectural Design
processSteps.description: Our architects create concept designs and detailed plans for your approval.

processSteps.title: Planning Permission
processSteps.description: We handle all planning applications and building regulation approvals.

processSteps.title: Construction
processSteps.description: Our team builds your home with precision and care, keeping you informed throughout the process.

processSteps.title: Final Inspection & Handover
processSteps.description: After thorough quality checks, we proudly hand over your new home.

Luxury family home with premium materials and finishes
Elegant interior design complementing the architectural style

categories.title: Extensions
categories.description: Expand your living space with beautifully designed extensions

content.introduction: Our extension services provide the perfect solution for adding space and value to your home. Whether you need a rear extension, side return, or multi-story addition, we deliver exceptional results that seamlessly integrate with your existing property.

sections.title: Design & Planning
sections.content: Our expert designers work closely with you to create an extension that complements your home's architecture while meeting your functional requirements.

sections.title: Seamless Integration
sections.content: We pay special attention to ensuring your extension blends seamlessly with the existing structure, both externally and internally.

featuredProjects.title: Contemporary Glass Extension
featuredProjects.description: A modern glass extension creating a light-filled kitchen and dining space

featuredProjects.title: Two-Story Side Extension
featuredProjects.description: A substantial extension providing additional bedrooms and living space

testimonials.quote: Our kitchen extension has transformed the way we live in our home. Sovran Group managed the entire process effortlessly, from design to completion.
testimonials.author: Daniel Parker

testimonials.quote: The extension blends so perfectly with our period property that it looks like it was always there. The craftsmanship and attention to detail are exceptional.
testimonials.author: Catherine Mitchell

processSteps.title: Initial Consultation
processSteps.description: We discuss your extension needs, budget, and timeline to understand your requirements.

processSteps.title: Design Development
processSteps.description: Our designers create detailed plans and 3D visualizations of your extension.

processSteps.title: Planning & Approvals
processSteps.description: We handle all planning applications and building regulation approvals.

processSteps.title: Construction Phase
processSteps.description: Our team builds your extension with minimal disruption to your daily life.

processSteps.title: Finishing & Handover
processSteps.description: After thorough quality checks, we complete all finishing touches and hand over your new space.

Elegantly designed extension complementing the existing architecture

categories.title: Loft Conversions
categories.description: Transform unused attic space into valuable living areas

content.introduction: Our loft conversion services help you maximize your home's potential by transforming underutilized attic space into beautiful, functional rooms. Whether you need an additional bedroom, home office, or bathroom, we create stunning loft spaces that add value to your property.

sections.title: Tailored Design
sections.content: We design loft conversions that make the most of your available space, with clever storage solutions and optimized layouts.

sections.title: Structural Expertise
sections.content: Our team handles all structural aspects of your loft conversion, ensuring safety and compliance with building regulations.

featuredProjects.title: Master Suite Loft Conversion
featuredProjects.description: A spacious loft conversion incorporating a bedroom, ensuite bathroom, and dressing area

featuredProjects.title: Home Office Loft Conversion
featuredProjects.description: A bright, airy loft space transformed into a productive home working environment

testimonials.quote: The loft conversion has given us the extra space we desperately needed. The team's ability to maximize the available space while creating a beautiful room was impressive.
testimonials.author: Robert Thompson

testimonials.quote: Our loft office has been a game-changer for working from home. Sovran Group's attention to detail with the storage solutions and lighting design was exceptional.
testimonials.author: Sophia Lewis

processSteps.title: Feasibility Assessment
processSteps.description: We assess your loft space to determine the most suitable conversion type for your home.

processSteps.title: Design & Planning
processSteps.description: Our designers create detailed plans for your loft conversion, incorporating your specific requirements.

processSteps.title: Building Regulations & Permits
processSteps.description: We handle all necessary approvals and ensure compliance with building regulations.

processSteps.title: Construction Phase
processSteps.description: Our experienced team carries out the conversion with minimal disruption to your home.

processSteps.title: Finishing & Handover
processSteps.description: We complete all finishing touches and ensure your new loft space is ready for use.

gallery.caption: Elegant loft bedroom with built-in storage solutions
Bright loft office space with ample natural light
Custom storage solutions maximizing loft space

categories.title: Basements
categories.description: Create valuable additional living space below your home

content.introduction: Our basement construction and conversion services provide an excellent way to significantly increase your living space without extending your property's footprint. From new basement excavations to conversions of existing cellars, we deliver high-quality underground spaces that are bright, dry, and comfortable.

sections.title: Structural Excellence
sections.content: Our specialist team handles the complex structural work involved in basement projects, ensuring waterproofing, ventilation, and accessibility are all expertly addressed.

sections.title: Versatile Spaces
sections.content: We create basements for a variety of purposes, including entertainment areas, additional bedrooms, home gyms, wine cellars, or self-contained apartments.

featuredProjects.title: Luxury Family Entertainment Basement
featuredProjects.description: A spacious basement incorporating a cinema room, games area, and bar

featuredProjects.title: Self-Contained Garden Flat
featuredProjects.description: A basement conversion creating a separate apartment with garden access

testimonials.quote: The basement has doubled our living space and created the perfect entertainment area for our family. The team's expertise in handling the technical aspects was impressive.
testimonials.author: James Wilson

testimonials.quote: Our basement apartment has added significant value to our property. The quality of waterproofing and ventilation systems installed gives us complete peace of mind.
testimonials.author: Emma Richards

processSteps.title: Feasibility Study
processSteps.description: We assess your property's suitability for a basement project and discuss options.

processSteps.title: Detailed Design
processSteps.description: Our specialists create comprehensive plans addressing structural, waterproofing, and interior design aspects.

processSteps.title: Planning & Building Regulations
processSteps.description: We handle all necessary permissions and ensure compliance with regulations.

processSteps.title: Excavation & Construction
processSteps.description: Our expert team carries out the complex construction work with minimal disruption.

processSteps.title: Waterproofing & Finishing
processSteps.description: We implement robust waterproofing systems and complete all finishing elements.

gallery.caption: Spacious basement entertainment area with premium finishes
Bright basement apartment with clever lighting solutions
Luxurious basement wine cellar and tasting area

categories.title: Landscaping
categories.description: Transform your outdoor spaces with expert landscaping services

content.introduction: Our professional landscaping services help you create beautiful, functional outdoor spaces that complement your property and lifestyle. From garden redesigns to patios, decking, and planting schemes, we transform outdoor areas into extensions of your home.

sections.title: Garden Design
sections.content: Our landscape designers create outdoor spaces that reflect your personal style and meet your practical requirements, whether you prefer contemporary minimalism or traditional charm.

sections.title: Hard Landscaping
sections.content: We implement high-quality paving, decking, walls, and structures that provide the framework for your garden and withstand the test of time.

featuredProjects.title: Contemporary Urban Garden
featuredProjects.description: A modern outdoor space designed for entertainment and relaxation in a city setting

featuredProjects.title: Traditional Country Garden
featuredProjects.description: A landscaping project creating a classic English garden with distinct areas and seasonal interest

testimonials.quote: Sovran Group transformed our neglected garden into a beautiful outdoor living space that we use year-round. Their design vision and attention to detail were exceptional.
testimonials.author: Catherine Mitchell

testimonials.quote: The landscaping team created exactly what we envisioned for our outdoor space. The quality of the stonework and planting has made our garden the envy of our neighbors.
testimonials.author: Daniel Parker

processSteps.title: Site Assessment
processSteps.description: We evaluate your outdoor space, considering soil conditions, aspect, and existing features.

processSteps.title: Design Development
processSteps.description: Our landscape designers create detailed plans based on your preferences and requirements.

processSteps.title: Material Selection
processSteps.description: We help you choose the perfect materials for hard landscaping elements and select appropriate plants.

processSteps.title: Construction Phase
processSteps.description: Our skilled team implements the design, from groundwork to planting and finishing touches.

processSteps.title: Maintenance Planning
processSteps.description: We provide guidance on maintaining your new landscape and offer ongoing maintenance services if required.

gallery.caption: Modern outdoor entertaining space with clean lines and sophisticated planting
Traditional landscaping with stone pathways and lush planting
Contemporary water feature creating a focal point in a designed garden

categories.title: Swimming Pools
categories.description: Luxury swimming pool design and installation for residential properties

content.introduction: Our swimming pool services cover every aspect of pool design and installation, from initial concept to completion. Whether you're looking for an indoor pool, outdoor pool, or spa area, we create luxurious aquatic environments tailored to your property and preferences.

sections.title: Bespoke Design
sections.content: We design swimming pools that complement your property's architecture and landscape, with attention to functionality, aesthetics, and energy efficiency.

sections.title: Quality Construction
sections.content: Our specialist team handles the complex construction process, ensuring structural integrity, waterproofing, and installation of high-quality filtration and heating systems.

featuredProjects.title: Indoor Leisure Complex
featuredProjects.description: A luxury indoor swimming pool with adjoining spa facilities and relaxation area

featuredProjects.title: Contemporary Outdoor Pool
featuredProjects.description: A sleek, modern outdoor pool designed to complement a minimalist garden landscape

testimonials.quote: The indoor pool complex has transformed our home and lifestyle. Sovran Group's expertise in managing such a complex project was impressive from start to finish.
testimonials.author: Michael Harris

testimonials.quote: Our outdoor pool is not just beautiful but also practical and energy-efficient. The team's attention to detail with the surrounding landscaping created a perfect outdoor oasis.
testimonials.author: Alexandra Winters

processSteps.title: Consultation & Site Survey
processSteps.description: We discuss your requirements and assess your property's suitability for a swimming pool.

processSteps.title: Design Development
processSteps.description: Our designers create detailed plans for your pool, considering structural requirements and aesthetic preferences.

processSteps.title: Planning & Permissions
processSteps.description: We handle all necessary planning applications and building regulation approvals.

processSteps.title: Construction Phase
processSteps.description: Our specialist team carries out the construction work with precision and attention to detail.

processSteps.title: Commissioning & Handover
processSteps.description: We test all systems, provide instruction on maintenance, and ensure your pool is ready for use.

Contemporary outdoor pool with stylish surrounding patio
